name: 林柏圻
objective:
【注意事項】
1. 本課程對象為「0 基礎」之德語學習者，已超過 A1.1 的同學請勿加選。
2. 為維持課程品質，人數超過 30 人之後不再開放加選。
3. 加選名額有限，人數過多時將於第一堂課抽籤決定。
4. 第一堂課會說明上課方式及相關規定，請勿缺席。
5. 為維持課程品質，本課程無法開放旁聽。
-----------------------------------------------
本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

This course is designed for Chinese native speakers in mind. The language of instruction and course materials will be primarily in German and Chinese. International students who want to take this course are strongly recommended to have proficiency in the Chinese language.
